title: Lord Dalton Piscarilius

properties.name: description
properties.value: Lord Dalton Piscarilius was the leader of Piscarilius until his death during a fishing trip.[1] His only daughter, Lady Shauna Piscarilius, succeeded him as leader of Piscarilius.[1]

content:
Lord Dalton Piscarilius was the leader of Piscarilius until his death during a fishing trip.[1] His only daughter, Lady Shauna Piscarilius, succeeded him as leader of Piscarilius.[1]

Lady Shauna describes him as a man only interested in his own wealth, ignorant of the struggles of his own people.[2]

Predecessor Title Successor
Eventually Lord Piscarilius II Leader of Piscarilius Lady Shauna Piscarilius

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ 1.0 1.1 Lady Shauna Piscarilius, Old School RuneScape. "I was born into the Piscarilius House as the only child of Lord Dalton Piscarilius. After my fool of a father got himself killed on a fishing trip, leadership fell to me."
  2. ^ Lady Shauna Piscarilius, Old School RuneScape. "My father never cared about anyone. He was far more interested in increasing his own wealth at the cost of his people."
